question.description: The task text. It may contain {int} as a placeholder for a random number.

count.description: How many times the card can occur in one session -> implicit higher probability

uses.description: How often the (interactive) card can be used.

rounds.description: How many rounds the card is active for. If uses > 1, the rounds are counted after each use. Use -1 for infinite duration.

id.description: The ID of this task. Note that this is NOT always the index in the tasks list.
